param.name: dry_run
param.label: Dry run?
param.help: Dry run generates the macroScript.txt file and executes every step of the workflow except running 3DCS

param.name: analysis_type
param.label: Analysis Type
param.help: Select Montecarlo simulation or contributor analysis (sensitivity)

param.name: bucket_id
param.label: Bucket ID or namespace
param.help: Type in the bucket ID string or namespace in the format [bucket-owner]/[bucket-name]

param.name: model_directory
param.label: Model Path
param.help: Directory within the bucket with the model and all the required files

param.name: output_directory
param.label: Output Path
param.help: Output directory within the bucket to store outputs and logs. It cannot be inside the Model Directory!

param.name: concurrency
param.label: Number of Workers
param.help: Number of workers used to run the simulations. A SLURM job is submitted for each worker.

param.name: thread
param.label: Number of Threads per Worker
param.help: Number of threads used to run the simulation. Be aware that N threads require more than N times the memory needed for a single thread.

param.name: dcs_load
param.label: Command to load 3DCS
param.help: To load the environment, enter the appropriate command, for example: module load module-name or source path/to/env.sh.

param.name: dcs_run
param.label: Command to run 3DCS
param.help: Specify the PATH as seen from Windows Subsystem for Linux or Wine

param.name: resource
param.label: Resource
param.help: Resource to run the simulation task

param.name: jobschedulertype
param.label: Select Controller, SLURM Partition or PBS Queue

param.name: _sch__dd_partition_e_
param.label: SLURM partition
param.help: Partition to submit the interactive job. Leave empty to let SLURM pick the optimal option.

param.name: max_workers_per_node
param.label: Max Workers per Node
param.help: To reduce compute costs, estimate the required memory and maximize memory utilization by fitting as many workers as possible in a single node.

param.name: _sch__dd_time_e_
param.label: Walltime
param.help: Maximum walltime per job

param.name: scheduler_directives
param.label: Scheduler directives
param.help: e.g. --mem=1000;--gpus-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the SBATCH keyword.
